QuestData.Title: Close Escort
QuestData.Description: Alright, I think I've got it working again. You've got to get the catapult to the stone trogg town, Needlerock Slag, just to the north of the front.$B$BThe driver will go with you. I'll head back and let Gravel know.$B$BThere's no doubt that the stone troggs will try to stop you. You just keep them off of the catapult. It packs a big punch.$B$BLet me know when you're ready, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort the Earthen Catapult safely to Needlerock Slag.
QuestData.RewardText: <The catapult chief gives you an appraising look.>$B$BWord of your prowess has spread ahead of you, $r. Let's see if you can help us keep these fungal horrors off of the front.
